code: import axios from"axios";export var register=function register(newUser){return axios.post("/api/v1/users/register",newUser).then(function(res){return console.log(res);}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});};export var login=function login(user){return axios.post("/api/v1/users/login",user).then(function(res){console.log(res.data.token);localStorage.setItem("usertoken",res.data.token);return res.data.token;}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});};
